name: Vanilla Skin Body & Hair Fragrance Mist
categories: Fragrance, Women, Body Mist & Hair Mist
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes:Sugar Crystals, Cashmere Wood, Vanilla.About the Fragrance:This fragrance is familiar, delectable, hypnotic, and decadent. Vanilla Skin, unlike any vanilla fragrance, evokes an iconic creaminess wrapped in a kaleidoscope of spice and intrigue. The dual nature of pink pepper and sugar settle down through rich cashmere before nestling into a core of addictive vanilla and cozy sandalwood. Vanilla Skin is a multidimensional take on an intoxicating sensual gourmand.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Water/Eau/Aqua, Fragrance/Parfum, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Farnesol, Limonene......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.
